title: Thathi Thaavum Paper Naan lyrics -Boss Engira Baskaran songs lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Karthik 
Song: Thathi Thaavum Paper Naan
Movie: Boss Engira Baskaran 
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar

Thathi thaavum paper naan
Ennai boata pola senjaale
Kick yethi yethithaan
Ennai kavuthaale
Inku pona penna naan
Vandhu wine-a oothi ponale
Mappu yethi yethithaan
Mella odhachaale

Enna paduren enna psesuren
Ennaku puriya-villai
Engu pogiren enna pannuren
Ennaku theriya-villai

Unsondham naan en anbu nee
Un mummy en anti-ee
Un sister-um en brother-pol
Endrume naan vazhalam va va

Sattai packet-il vaikira
Cigaratte packet-ah maarura
Heart-u pakkathil sellama
Ceendura-aahhhh

Hero honda-va otturen
Hero-polave mathura
Zero pakkathil koduthaan
Podura-aahhhh

College poyum therala
Knowledge edhuvum aerala
Marriage panna thevala
Maane udane va

Thathi thaavum paper naan
Ennai boata pola senjaale
Kick yethi yethithaan
Ennai kavuthaale
Inku pona penna naan
Vandhu wine-a oothi ponale
Mappu yethi yethithaan
Mella odhachaale
Town-nu bus-ula ariye
Ticket vangi ne neetuna
Vethu ticket-um lottery aagume

England-huku raniya
English ne pesina
ABCD-a nesikka thonume
Incomeing calluku kasuilla
Outgoing callukum kasuilla
Un number thavira pesala
Maane udane vaa..
